dict.string: Check who is Streaming on twitch.tv and watch your favorite Stream via LiveStreamer on VLC.
List current TOP live streams on twitch.tv.
Search live streams on twitch.tv (game or channel).
on alfred_script(q) tell application "Alfred 2" to search "tw " & q end alfred_script
Search games that are live on twitch.tv.
Searching and downloading game covers... Please wait it takes some time (about 1 minute)...

keywords and description: ———————————————————————————————— twtop = top50 live streams on twitch.tv (sort by number of viewers) tw = searching for a specific stream (game or streamer/channel)
optional: twgame = searching for games that are live on at least one stream twcover = searching and downloading game covers (do this, if you deleted your cover folder)
examples: ———————————————————————————————— ‚twtop’
‚tw warcraft‘ (searches for streams of „world of warcraft“ or „warcraft3“ as well as streams of a streamer who is called like „warcraftBoy“)
optional: ‚twgame world‘ (lists games like „world of warcraft“ - you can select one of them like WoW, that leads you to ‚tw world of warcraft‘ s.a.)
‚twcover‘
known bugs or issues: ———————————————————————————————— - optional function ‚twgame‘: ‚twgame war‘ does not find „world war“, ‚twgame w‘ does. This issue occurs cuz of twitch api and hopefully will be fixed.
